content.raw: Okay, this is a lot of comments. I suggest merging this with minimal changes, then adding rich indexing and RT search \(I should be able to do this after we finish the discussion in the comments\), then going back to `iterfind` and `chain` facades \(would be nice if you help with these\).
content.html: Okay, this is a lot of comments. I suggest merging this with minimal changes, then adding rich indexing and RT search (I should be able to do this after we finish the discussion in the comments), then going back to iterfind and chain facades (would be nice if you help with these).
